_comments._editing_guide: The fields below can be edited to customize the department page content. These texts will appear on the public website.
_comments._introText: Short introduction that appears at the top of the department page
_comments._descriptionText: Detailed description - you can use placeholder variables like {jurisdiction.name}, {department.name}, etc.
_comments._roleText: Description of the department's role and importance to the province
_comments._programsHeading: Heading for the programs and services section
_comments._programsDescription: Description of what programs and services this department offers

introText: The Ministry of Tourism, Culture and Sport promotes Ontario's tourism industry, cultural heritage, and recreational opportunities, supporting economic development and quality of life.
descriptionText: The Ontario Ministry of Tourism, Culture and Sport spent $1.8B in fiscal year (FY) 2023-24, representing 0.9% of the $206.6B in total provincial spending. This investment supports tourism, cultural programs, and recreational activities.
roleText: Tourism, culture, and sport contribute significantly to Ontario's economy and identity. This ministry supports the tourism industry, preserves cultural heritage, and promotes recreational opportunities that enhance community life.
programsDescription: The Ministry of Tourism, Culture and Sport operates programs including tourism marketing, cultural tax credits, arts funding, museum support, sport development, and heritage preservation.
